question: Given below and the atomic masses of the elements:
| Element | Atomic Mass |
| Li | 7 |
| Na | 23 |
| K | 39 |
| Cl | 35.5 |
| Ca | 40 |
| Br | 80 |
| Sr | 88 |
| I | 127 |
| Ba | 137 |
Which of the following doesn't form triad?
explanation: Dobereiner's triads consist of chemically similar elements.
Cl (Non-metal), K (Alkali metal), Ca (Alkaline earth) are chemically different and do not form a triad.
